activities: Ascom Network Testing is a global organization offering mobile network testing, optimization, benchmarking and monitoring solutions with employees, contractors, and agents being employed or utilized worldwide, as well as obtaining or sending the personal information of customers or third parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data regarding the organization, its employees, contractors, agents, customers and third parties shall be covered within the Safe Harbor Framework.  Personal data will not include ananymized data or data reported in the aggregate.  We cannot guaranty the safety of data manually entered on the Internet.
recoursemech: Ascom Network Testing shall fully comply with U.S. data privacy authorities, EU data protection authorities (EU DPAs), and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) regarding any unresolved complaints.
